iana.template_text:
Name : Petteri Kangaslampi

E-mail : petteri.kangaslampi&nokia.com

MIME media type name : Video

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.nokia.interleaved-multimedia

Required parameters : None

Optional parameters :  None

Encoding considerations :
Arbitrary binary data -- binary encoding must be used

Security considerations :
Security issues have not been assessed.

Interoperability considerations :  None

Published specification : Not available

Applications which use this media :
Nokia 9210 Communicator video player, related tools

Additional information :

 1. Magic number(s) : 4 bytes at offset 0: 0x00 0x00 0x01 0xff
 2. File extension(s) : .nim
 3. Macintosh file type code : N/A
 4. Object Identifiers: N/A

Nokia Interleaved Multimedia (NIM) is a multiplexed audio/video
format designed specifically for Nokia 9210 Communicator video
player.

Person to contact for further information :

 1. Name : Petteri Kangaslampi
 2. E-mail : petteri.kangaslampi&nokia.com

Intended usage : Limited Use
Used in Nokia 9210 Communicator video player and related tools.

Author/Change controller : Nokia Mobile Phones

(last updated 03-16-01)

(created 03-16-01)
